contactpage.title: Who are MINEIROS?
contactpage.text: We are a remote-first company headquartered in Berlin, Germany that solves development, automation and security challenges in cloud infrastructure. We are working on open-source products that support development teams to create better software.
contactpage.m-text: Save weeks of engineering time by choosing from pre-configured end-to-end architectures such as Kubernetes, ECS, Compute and Serverless.
